EmailTemplate.subject: Sorry We Missed You for Your Setup Call - {!Lighthouse_Worksheets__c.Yodle_ID__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Lighthouse_Worksheets__c.Practice_Name__c},
We couldn’t reach you today for your Lighthouse setup call. This call is crucial to get started using Lighthouse, so please get in touch with us to reschedule at your earliest convenience.
On the call, a consultant will teach you everything you need to know to get the most out of Lighthouse. The call usually takes about 45 minutes and is the most effective when you have access to a computer.
Simply reply to this email with the best time to reach you or give us a call Monday - Friday from 8am to 7pm EST.
Thank you for choosing Lighthouse. We appreciate your business!
{!User.FirstName} Lighthouse Support (888) 427-5454
